A: Giverr is an online social network that connects non-profits and charities with volunteers, aiming to build community and encourage people to meet up in real life to engage in selfless activities

Giverr allows users to create and join volunteering events. Both organizations and individual users can create events, subject to approval by the Giverr team. Users can browse events by categories, sign up to volunteer, and connect with other like-minded individuals in their community.
Yes, Giverr is free for both non-profits and volunteers. We aim to make it easier for everyone to connect and contribute to their communities.

Q: How do non-profits and charities join Giverr?
A: Non-profits and charities can join Giverr by signing up and creating an organization profile. Once the profile is approved, they can start posting events and recruiting volunteers.

Q: How do I create an event?
A: To create an event, log in to your Giverr account, click on the "Submit Event" button, fill in the details of your event, select the appropriate category, and publish it. Once approved, your event will then be visible to all users.
